module.name: Parking Pro
module.description: PARK PRO - COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Provides Multiple Parking Lots, per extension assignment for default lots, Park and Page Announce and other advanced parking features to come
module.changelog: *15.0.13* FREEI-1130 fix PHP 7.3 compatibility issue *15.0.12.14* FREEI-1851 Park pro does not send calls to assigned extension park lot *15.0.12.13* FREEI-1924 Bulk Import does not set parking lot *15.0.12.12* Packaging of ver 15.0.12.12 *15.0.12.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.12.11 *15.0.12.10* FREEI-1924 Bulk Import does not set parking lot *15.0.12.9* FREEI-1923 Quick Config does not set default Parking Lot *15.0.12.8* FREEI-1573 Updates to licensing *15.0.12.7* FREEPBX-21490 Fixing-Allow to modify the pannounce. *15.0.12.6* FREEI-1293 Park and Announce module allows to create Multiple entries with same Park & Announce extension. *15.0.12.5* FREEI-718 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 13) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is adding slashes "\\" to CallerID Prepend field. *15.0.12.4* FREEI-718 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 13) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is adding slashes "\\" to CallerID Prepend field. *15.0.12.3* FREEPBX-20376 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 14) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is not restoring the Park and Announce entries. *15.0.12.2* FREEPBX-20089 Park and Announce entries flushed while doing backup restore *15.0.12.1* FREEPBX-19989 *15.0.11* FREEPBX-19540 *15.0.9* FREEPBX-18784 Page announcements message under Park and announce *15.0.8* FREEPBX-18867 5 seconds delay in playing the park announcement message. *15.0.7* FREEPBX-18833 Parking Lot module allows to create duplicate entries with same Parking Lot Name *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18721 and FREEPBX-18720 *15.0.5* FREEPBX-18725 FREEPBX-18724 *15.0.4* FREEPBX-18340 Page layout issue in Park and announce edit page. *15.0.3* FREEPBX-17548 Amount spelled as ammount in park and annouce tooltips *15.0.1* FREEPBX-15555 Exception Asterisk is not connected error issue fix
